name: Ensure setting the Strict-Transport-Security HTTP header to secure and encrypt communications to the Node.js server
Ensure setting the Strict-Transport-Security HTTP header to secure and encrypt communications to the Node.js server
Avoid providing password in Web Service URL
Ensure you use HTTPS protocol for traffic to particular domains with Android 8.1 and older
Ensure you are not using deprecated SSL protocols to secure your connection
Prefer using SystemDefaultHttpClient Constructor to ensure better transport layer security
